column4: hey all, i have ubuntu 10.10 dual boot on my laptop.  when i first installed during boot i get a nice ubuntu logo with the activity dots moving under it.  every time i install my video card driver (nvidia) that boot logo changes to an oldschool looking terminal text of "UBUNTU 10.10"
nvidia drivers change it because the ubuntu logo that looks nice is activated using nouveau drivers by default, with nvidia enabled the nouveau are disabled
at least in my experience that is....if you find a solution i'd love to know it as well :)
